original_text: They made a small yard for the priests and another big yard with doors. They covered the doors with bronze.
korean_text: 또 제사장의 뜰과 큰 뜰과 뜰 문을 만들고 그 문짝에 놋을 입혔고

sentences.original_text: They made a small yard for the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제사장들을 위해 작은 마당을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and another big yard with doors
sentences.korean_translation: 문이 있는 또 다른 큰 마당을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: They covered the doors with bronze
